question: List singers and editors who received 2000.0.
sql_query1:
SELECT Stringers.name
FROM Stringers
WHERE Stringers.Payment = 2000.0
UNION
SELECT Editors.name
FROM Editors
WHERE Editors.Payment = 2000.0
sql_query2:
SELECT Stringers.name
FROM Stringers
UNION
SELECT Editors.name
FROM Editors
WHERE Editors.Payment = 2000.0
interpretation1: Which singers received 2000.0 and which editors received the same payment?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all singers and also provide a list of editors with a payment of 2000.0.
